meta.name: Mike Judge's Beavis and Butt-Head
meta.description: In this new iteration, Beavis and Butt-Head are entering a whole new Gen Z world. Comedy Central has ordered two seasons of the new series with meta-themes relatable to both new and old fans - Gen X parents and their Gen Z kids. Judge is set to write, produce and provide voice over for both iconic characters.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Oldholio
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis takes too many old-people medications.

videos.title: Smart Beavis and Butt-Head in Discoverers
videos.overview: On a mission to Earth, Smart Beavis and Butt-Head make a discovery.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Escape Room
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to solve an Escape Room only to wind up trapped in the bathroom.

videos.title: Beavis and Fire - Beavis in The Special One
videos.overview: Beavis meets his greatest hero, Fire.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Boxed In
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get trapped in a cardboard box while attempting to hide out in the school.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Beekeepers
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to harvest honey from a wasps' nest.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Roof
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get stuck on top of Tom Anderson's house.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in River
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head go tubing on a river and end up lost at sea.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The New Enemy
videos.overview: Raccoons steal Beavis and Butt-Head's nachos, and the boys fight back.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Doppelg√§nger
videos.overview: Beavis mistakes a stranger for Butthead, and then can't get rid of him.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Nice Butt-Head
videos.overview: Butt-Head is given medication for his aggression towards Beavis and becomes a little too nice.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Home Aide
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head run out of beer money, so Beavis has to find a job.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head put on sunglasses and think they're virtual reality goggles.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Locked Out
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head get locked out of their house and destroy it trying to get back in.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Kidney
videos.overview: Middle-Aged Beavis ruins his kidneys and a donor from Beavis's past saves the day.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Good Deed
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head perform their first ever good deed by putting DDT in the punch at the school dance.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Two Stupid Men
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head fulfill their civic duty as jurors.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Freaky Friday
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head mistakenly think they have switched bodies.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Weird Girl
videos.overview: Beavis encounters a secret admirer at school.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Time Travelers
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head cross back and forth across the state line into the Mountain Time Zone and think they can travel through time.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Spiritual Journey
videos.overview: Beavis sees the face of Jesus in a nacho chip, setting him on an epic journey to seek answers to the big question - "Why do I never score?".

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Refuse Service
videos.overview: The boys discover they have the right to refuse service to customers at Burger World.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Downward Dumbass
videos.overview: Beavis tries on yoga pants and can't get them off.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Most Dangerous Game
videos.overview: In order to prevent the other from putting their hand in a bowl of warm water, causing them to pee their pants, Beavis and Butt-Head stay awake for several days.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Bone Hunters
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head construct a dinosaur skeleton out of bones from a BBQ.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Meditation Sucks
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to empty their minds and find they are surprisingly good at it.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Polling Place
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head mistake their neighborhood polling place for a strip club.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Old Man Beavis
videos.overview: Butt-Head makes Beavis look old so he can buy beer. Beavis ends up in a senior living facility and almost scores with an 80-year-old woman.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's War Stories: Incheon
videos.overview: Tom Anderson recounts his time in the Battle of Incheon.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Hunting Trip
videos.overview: Tom Anderson takes Beavis and Butt-Head to the woods to hunt deer.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Pardon Our Dust
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head attend a city council meeting to get their apartment demolished.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Pranks
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head struggle to prank a neighborhood home.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Hellhole
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head fall into a sewer and think they have died and gone to hell.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Take a Bow
videos.overview: Butt-Head teaches Beavis a new game, which puts him in the hospital.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Tobacco Farmers
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to grow their own tobacco like George Washington.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Married
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head go to the courthouse to settle a parking ticket and wind up getting married.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Sad Boys
videos.overview: After they see the attention an angsty emo kid gets from the ladies, Beavis and Butt-Head pretend to be sad and end up in a psychiatric hospital.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Are You There God? It's Me, Beavis
videos.overview: Beavis talks to God about his body and he thinks he is going through puberty, when in reality, he has rabies after being bitten by a rabid skunk.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Day Butt-Head Went Too Far
videos.overview: Beavis decides he has finally had enough and hires a hitman to kill Butt-Head.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's War Stories: Heartbreak Ridge
videos.overview: Tom Anderson recounts his time in the Battle of Heartbreak Ridge.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Spring Break
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to mail themselves to Spring Break.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Warrior
videos.overview: After Beavis is challenged to a fight, Butt-Head trains him to become a champion.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Vasectomies
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head think their sperms are holding themback from scoring and decide to get vasectomies.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Stolen Valor
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head pose as vets for free beer.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Breeding Frenzy
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to get rich by breeding dogs with a raccoon they found in a garbage can.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Hoarders
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head fill their house with garbage to meet girls.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Needle Dicks
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try acupuncture, and Beavis decides to spend the rest of his life with 50 needles in his face.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in The Ciabatta Zone
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head both want to wear the Burger World giant hamburger costume.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's War Stories: Korean Farmhouse
videos.overview: Tom Anderson tells the story of his time serving in the Korean War fixing a farmer's kitchen pipe.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Warehouse
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head get a warehouse job at the world's biggest internet retail company. You know the one we mean.

videos.title: Smart Beavis and Butt-Head in Abduction
videos.overview: Smart Beavis and Smart Butt-Head visit Earth and abduct Tom Anderson for human experiments.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Sleepover
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head are invited to sleep over at Cody's house when his parents mistakenly think they're good friends.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Braces
videos.overview: Butt-Head loses his braces and realizes he's beautiful.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Heart Attack
videos.overview: Middle-aged Butt-Head suffers a heart attack and it's up to Beavis to save him.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Plumber's Helpers
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head work for their childhood hero, Todd.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in A.I.
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to get A.I. to do their homework.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Scent of a Dumbass
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head mistake a can of pepper spray for men's cologne.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in New Couch
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head struggle to get a new couch into their apartment.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Nuts
videos.overview: Beavis receives the worst news of his life.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's War Stories: Love
videos.overview: Tom Anderson recounts his time recovering from injuries sustained at the Battle of Bloody Ridge, where he explains a time when love bloomed amidst in the middle of the war.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Bike
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head pay a visit to their old friend Stewart.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Life Savers
videos.overview: Van Driessen is badly injured in the woods, and only Beavis and Butt-Head can rescue him.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Tattoo
videos.overview: After a wild night out, middle-aged Beavis wakes up with a tattoo he doesn't remember getting.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Too Big to Fall
videos.overview: Middle-aged Butt-Head tries to avoid eviction by getting as fat as possible.

videos.title: Swipe Right with David Van Driessen
videos.overview: A look into the dating life of David Van Driessen.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Metal Detector
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head use Mr. Anderson's metal detector to find treasure.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Depositors
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head try to donate sperm at a regular bank.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's War Stories: Summer of Love
videos.overview: Tom Anderson recounts his experiences as a hippie during the Summer of Love after becoming disillusioned with the Vietnam War.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Nacho Shake
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head invent a new Burger World menu item that will make them rich.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Ear
videos.overview: Butt-Head blows off Beavis's ear and tries to reattach it.

videos.title: Songs of Nature with David Van Driessen
videos.overview: Mr. Van Driessen was all set to play some guitar beats for his new video series... until he took a legendary tumble and got mauled by a mountain lion.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Dearly Departed
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head think Beavis has died and is now a ghost.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in The Mission
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head join a church group, thinking it is a squad of soldiers going to war.

videos.title: Tom Anderson's Vacation Stories
videos.overview: Beavis and Butt-Head almost ruin the Andersons' vacation in Mexico before Tom beats them up.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Beavis H.
videos.overview: A new kid joins Beavis and Butt-Head's class.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Work from Home
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-head work and live at Burger World.

videos.title: Story Time with Dr. Beavis and Dr. Butt-Head
videos.overview: Old Beavis and Butt-Head write a book in the style of Dr. Seuss with its art style and writing, titled "Lumbass the Dumbass".

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Bed and Breakfast
videos.overview: When a woman mistakes Beavis and Butt-Head's house for her Airbnb, they think she wants to score.

videos.title: Old Beavis and Butt-Head in Million Dollar Reward
videos.overview: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head try to get a reward by turning themselves into the police for various crimes.

videos.title: Beavis and Butt-Head in Get Well Soon
videos.overview: Butt-Head makes Beavis break his arm so girls will sign his cast.
